name: Turntable
headline: AI-native operating system for analytics teams
description:
Turntable allows less technical analysts to build their own data pipelines. Companies use our AI-native workspace to scale their analytics without hiring more engineers.

If you use DBT or Airflow- or you're building out your data stack for the first time- please reach out!

founders.name: Justin Leder, Founder
founders.description: Justin most recently led the Commercial Data Science team at Cruise. Previously, he worked in a variety of data, strategy, & ops roles at Cruise and McKinsey.

founders.name: Ian Tracey, Founder
founders.description:
Ian is a co-founder & CTO of Turntable.

Ian has spent years as a tech lead where he led the development of some of Stripe's hosted UI products and the business ML platform at Pinterest. Previously, Ian worked on autonomous drone software at Latitude and was the founder of Hack Arizona, one of the largest collegiate hackathons in the US with over 1100 hackers attending annually.

[Backed by Y Combinator](https://www.turntable.so/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/turntable>)
# Where humans and AI build data products
Turntable is a collaborative workspace to develop, deploy, and monitor your reporting stack in half the time
Get early access
## TRUSTED BY HUNDREDS OF LEADING DATA TEAMS
![Grab](https://www.turntable.so/grab.svg)![Spotify](https://www.turntable.so/spotify.svg)![Louis Vuitton](https://www.turntable.so/lv.svg)![The Atlantic](https://www.turntable.so/the_atlantic.svg)![gopuff](https://www.turntable.so/gopuff.svg)![Braze](https://www.turntable.so/braze.svg)![Wayfair](https://www.turntable.so/wayfair.svg)![Xero](https://www.turntable.so/xero_logo.svg)![Hubspot](https://www.turntable.so/hubspot.svg)![Pave](https://www.turntable.so/pave_logo.svg)
## A powerful data IDE
### Purpose built code editor
Run queries, document tables, and transform data using dbt Core, SQLMesh, or plain SQL.
### Column-level lineage
Trace columns from upstream sources, to transforms and downstream dashboards.
### Multiplayer projects
Work on projects together and get teammates caught up to speed.
```
SELECT 
 users.name, 
 orders.order_date, 
 SUM(order_items.quantity * products.price) AS total_amount
FROM 
 users
 JOIN orders ON users.id = orders.user_id
 JOIN order_items ON orders.id = order_items.order_id
 JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.id
WHERE 
 orders.order_date >= '2023-01-01'
GROUP BY 
 users.name, orders.order_date
ORDER BY 
 total_amount DESC
LIMIT 10;
```

Alex
Jen
### Automated catalog
Sync sources, metrics and dashboards with up-to-date metadata and documentation.
Source| stripe| Synced 10 min ago  
---|---|---  
Model| leads| 10 unused columns  
Dashboard| sales_q4| 47 views today  
### Virtual data branches
Modify, preview, and deploy transform and BI changes instantly. Avoid data duplication.
## Models, metrics, and dashboards in minutes
A native AI assistant helps you spend less time managing your DAG, building models, and changing downstream BI tools and reports.
  * Context across your data stack
  * Auto EDA and profiling
  * Auto-generate documentation
  * Generate and edit models
  * Leverage warehouse design
  * Interpret data lineage

## Find problems before your stakeholders do
Full end-to-end visibility into your data stack. Discover breaking changes and data quality issues in your pipelines and dashboards before they go to production.
  * Orchestrate transforms and jobs
  * Detect breaking changes
  * Set up alerts and monitoring
  * Run data diffs across environments


![dbt](https://www.turntable.so/_next/static/media/dbt.f00d6df4.svg)
![looker](https://www.turntable.so/_next/static/media/looker.c44969d0.svg)

Works with your data stack 
Setup takes 5 minutes. Turntable supports all the tools you already love and use.

generated_description:
**Turntable: Empowering Analysts with AI-Native Solutions**

Founded in 2023 and hailing from Y Combinator Batch W23, Turntable is a New York-based startup on a mission to revolutionize the analytics landscape. Turntable is like an AI-powered hub for analytics teams, designed specifically to let less technical analysts build their own data pipelines without the need to involve more engineers. It allows companies to scale their analytics efforts efficiently, particularly beneficial for those using tools like DBT or Airflow—or for newcomers building their data stack from scratch.

At its core, Turntable offers a collaborative workspace where users can develop, deploy, and monitor their reporting stack, streamlining what typically takes countless hours into a fraction of the time. The platform features a powerful data IDE with a purpose-built code editor that supports common tools and languages like dbt Core and SQL.

Turntable benefits from some nifty features:

- **Automated Cataloging:** Sync sources and dashboards with updated metadata.
- **Column-Level Lineage:** Trace data origins through the entire pipeline, improving transparency and accountability.
- **Multiplayer Projects:** Collaborate with teammates in real-time, making team efforts more integrated and effective.
- **Virtual Data Branches:** Modify and deploy changes to BI tools instantly, preventing data duplication.
- **End-to-End Visibility:** Track data quality across the board so you can identify and solve issues before they reach stakeholders.

This robust platform is already trusted by a number of reputable data teams, including Spotify, Louis Vuitton, and HubSpot. The simplicity of setting up Turntable—taking merely five minutes—makes it an inviting option for organizations looking to supercharge their analytics.

With a small but mighty team of three, backed by influential partners like Michael Seibel, Turntable is poised for growth in a data-centric world. If you find yourself needing an efficient way to enhance your analytics capabilities, whether it's through improved modeling or monitoring, you might want to check out Turntable’s offerings.

For more information or to get early access, visit [Turntable’s website](https://www.turntable.so).
